item.title: Portfolio
item.description: Please note: a complete version of my portfolio is hosted on GitHub here. Most of the old websites presented here are hand-coded, because I am an old school developer :) One of the old designs for my site PayToChina An even older version of my site A long time ago on a different domain A website for my school A resort in Ukrainian Crimea Ukrainian Crimea resort (old version) PC repair shop website Web design business website A parenting advice website A design business website Netgain Advisors Even Strength A website for a music tutor iShop, an online store
